name: Yahritza y Su Esencia
description:
'''Yahritza y su Esencia''' (Spanish for "Yahritza and her Essence") is an American trio from [[Washington (state)|Washington]] state's [[Yakima, Washington|Yakima Valley]] who specialize in [[Regional Mexican|regional Mexican music]]; specifically the urban sierreño subgenre. The band are three siblings: Yahritza Martínez (vocals and acoustic guitar), Armando "Mando" Martínez ([[twelve-string guitar]]), and Jairo Martínez ([[Acoustic bass guitar|acoustic bass]]).

For the week of April 9, 2022, their song "[[Soy el Único]]" appeared on the [[Billboard Global 200|''Billboard'' Global 200]]. Yahritza wrote the song when she was fourteen. At the [[23rd Annual Latin Grammy Awards]], the trio was nominated for [[Latin Grammy Award for Best New Artist|Best New Artist]] as well as for [[Latin Grammy Award for Best Norteño Album|Best Norteño Album]] for ''[[Obsessed (EP)|Obsessed]]'', their debut album.
